Uses of Interface
xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.Strategy

  • Packages that use Strategy 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
    Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size.

    • Uses of Strategy in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

      Classes in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager that implement Strategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStrategy
      Abstract implementation of a Strategy which is useful for most of the implemented strategies.
      class  AppendOnlyNStrategy
      This class provides a append only strategy which searches inside the last n allocated pages.
      class  AppendOnlyStrategy
      This class provides a append only strategy.
      class  BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy
      This class provides a strategy which makes a best fit search inside pages which have the most free space.
      class  BestFitStrategy
      This class provides the best-fit stratey for the record manager.
      class  DecoratorTesterStrategy
      This class makes some consistency checks before forwarding the calls to another strategy.
      class  FirstFitStrategy
      This class provides the first-fit-strategy for the record-manager.
      class  HybridAONFStrategy 
      class  HybridBFOEStrategy 
      class  HybridStrategy 
      class  LastToFirstFitStrategy
      This class provides a last-to-first-fit-strategy for the record-manager.
      class  LRUStrategy 
      class  NextFitStrategy
      This class provides the next-fit stratey for the record manager.
      class  NextFitWithHStrategy
      This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
      class  NextFitWithHWStrategy
      This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
      class  OneRecordPerPageStrategy
      This class provides one record per page strategy.
      Fields in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager declared as Strategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Strategy HybridBFOEStrategy.strategy 
      Methods in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager that return Strategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Strategy HybridStrategy.getFirstStrategy() 
      Strategy HybridStrategy.getSecondStrategy() 
      Strategy HybridBFOEStrategy.getSecondStrategy() 
      Strategy RecordManager.getStrategy()
      Returns the strategy which is used.
      static Strategy Utility.getStrategy(int recordManagerStrategy)
      Returns a strategy for the RecordManager: 0: OneRecordPerPage, 1: FirstFit, 2: NextFit, 3: AppendOnly, 4: AppendOnly(10), 5: BestFit(0.05), 6: BestFitOnNEmptiestPages(10), 7: NextFitWithH(10), 8: NextFitWithHW(10), 9: HybridAONF(10,0.85), 10: HybridBFOENFHStrategy(10), 11: HybridBFOENFHWStrategy(10), 12: LastToFirstFitStrategy, 13: LRUStrategy(10), 14: HybridLRULFStrategy(10)
      static Strategy Utility.getStrategy(int recordManagerStrategy, int n, double bestFitPercentage, double goalPercentage)
      Returns a strategy for the RecordManager: 0: OneRecordPerPage, 1: FirstFit, 2: NextFit, 3: AppendOnly, 4: AppendOnly(n), 5: BestFit(bestFitPercentage), 6: BestFitOnNEmptiestPages(n), 7: NextFitWithH(n), 8: NextFitWithHW(n), 9: HybridAONF(n,goalPercentage), 10: HybridBFOENFHStrategy(n), 11: HybridBFOENFHWStrategy(n), 12: LastToFirstFitStrategy, 13: LRUStrategy(n), 14: HybridLRULFStrategy(n)
      Constructors in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager with parameters of type Strategy 
      Constructor and Description
      HybridBFOEStrategy(int n, Strategy secondStrategy) 
      RecordManager(Container container, int pageSize, Strategy strategy, TIdManager tidManager, int numberOfDirectReserves)
      Creates a new record-manager which uses the given strategy and TIdManager.
